mapper.select: SELECT COUNT( id ) FROM cms_article WHERE deleted =0 AND STATUS =1 LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT( id ) FROM cms_article WHERE deleted =0 AND STATUS =1 AND category_id =#{categoryId} LIMIT 1

SELECT A.id, user_id, subject, message, digest, keyword, top, rate, rate_times, views, A.status, A.allow_comment, A.created_date, A.last_modified_date, A.deleted, U.username as user_username, C.id as cat_id, C.category_name as cat_category_name, C.description as cat_description, C.allow_comment as cat_allow_comment FROM cms_article AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN cms_user AS U ON user_id = U.id LEFT OUTER JOIN cms_category AS C ON category_id = C.id WHERE A.id=#{id} AND A.deleted =0 AND A.STATUS =1 LIMIT 1

select id,user_id,category_id,subject,rate,rate_times as ratetimes,views,top,status,deleted,cms_article.created_date as createddate,cms_article.last_modified_date as lastmodifieddate from cms_article where deleted=0 and year(created_date)=year(#{created_date}) and month(created_date)=month(#{created_date}) order by id desc
SELECT id, subject FROM cms_article WHERE deleted =0 AND STATUS =1 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 6
SELECT A.id, subject, top, views, A.created_date, A.last_modified_date FROM cms_article AS A WHERE A.deleted =0 AND A.STATUS =1 AND A.category_id=#{categoryId} ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT A.id, user_id, subject, keyword, top, rate, rate_times, views, A.status, A.allow_comment, A.created_date, A.last_modified_date, A.deleted, U.username as user_username FROM cms_article AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN cms_user AS U ON user_id = U.id WHERE A.deleted =0 AND A.STATUS =1 AND A.category_id=#{categoryId}

SELECT A.id, user_id, subject, digest, keyword, top, rate, rate_times, views, A.status, A.allow_comment, A.created_date, A.last_modified_date, A.deleted, U.username as user_username FROM cms_article AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN cms_user AS U ON user_id = U.id WHERE A.deleted =0 AND A.STATUS =1 AND A.category_id=#{categoryId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_article (user_id, category_id, subject, message, digest, keyword, top, rate, rate_times, views, allow_comment, status, deleted, created_date) VALUES (#{user.id}, #{category.id}, #{subject}, #{message}, #{digest}, #{keyword}, #{top}, 0, 0, 0, #{allowComment}, 0, 0, null)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cms_article WHERE deleted =1 LIMIT 500
